posts.post_content:
I’m building the pirates team set (w/o Wagner, obviously) and looking for ONLY SGC graded cards.  No particular backs, any will do.  Preferably in the SGC 30-50 range…

Seeing what all is out there.  Please message or email me at [url]jroberts3307@yahoo.com[/url] 


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk
